website_summaries.verdict: Stainless steel shears with micro-serrations from a trusted brand in kitchen supplies.
pros: Sharp scissors made of quality stainless steel
They come with a blade guard and can be washed in the dishwasher (although hand-washing is recommended)
These workhorse shears serve multiple purposes in the kitchen
cons: They cannot be taken apart for washing

customer_reviews.title: Rust spots after the 1st wash!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: "dishwasher safe"... er... no... rusted after 1 wash... literally rust spots everywhere. They are sharp but the fact they rusted the same day I opened the package is unforgivable. Returning!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Great for arthritic hands!
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible arthritis in my hands. I love Kitchenaid! I show a picture of my fingers, why I need a scissors with bigger openings for my fingers. A great product for arthritic hands and great quality. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Debie

customer_reviews.title: Bad*ss beyond compare.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of kitchen shears and bought these almost exactly a year ago. All along, I've been super impressed with how sharp and well made they are. Today, however, they reached the pinnacle of bad*ss. After weeks of trying to find something that would cut a heavy rubber pond liner, I decided to try these. Four hours later, most of an 8 ft. X 8 ft. heavy-ply pond liner is in pieces, and I'm totally trashed, but the shears aren't. They're still sharp. That's beyond bad*ss. I'm buying another pair right now, in case they ever stop making them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch. Cuts meat very well and I love ...
customer_reviews.text: Where you put your fingers to cut has rubber lining which keeps the scissors from sliding when your hands are wet. Nice touch. Cuts meat very well and I love that it coordinates perfectly with my other gray appliances and kitchen items
customer_reviews.author: JWK

customer_reviews.title: No clue how these actually are as shears, but the color isn't accurate & i'm annoyed by that
customer_reviews.text: I don't actually do the kind of cooking that people USUALLY need cooking shears for, but I do love them for cutting open Amazon packages and actual food packages and suchlike. So I was basically buying for "okay price, recognizable brand, and LOOKED to be a cool color handle", and it turns out that whoever mentioned that no, the aqua is *not* a very intense color is completely accurate. I'm seriously contemplating seeing how much of a problem it'd be returning them because I am just that petty.
customer_reviews.author: jane smith

customer_reviews.title: Rust spots in less than a month.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so bummed about these shears. I've only used them a handful of times and have never gotten them wet. They may have gotten a little (microscopic) condensation from cutting open a bag of frozen vegetables or something but other than that, these have remained dry. I've had them for 3 weeks and noticed rust on them today. I was expecting a must better quality from KitchenAid and will not be keeping these.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia B.

customer_reviews.title: Rusted:(
customer_reviews.text: How can you use a rusty scissor to cut food?
customer_reviews.author: unsure

customer_reviews.title: 5 years daily use -- still tight & sharp
customer_reviews.text: Was shopping for a pair of all purpose scissors, thinking it would be nice to find a pair with the quality of these kitchen scissors, which, according to Amazon, I bought five years ago. They are holding up very well (although I've never tried cutting chicken bones with them). They are still tight and sharp despite daily use all that time. They are by far my favorite scissors, and I often use them for other cutting tasks around the house when the other scissors aren't up to the job. I'm ordering a second pair to use as all-purpose scissors around the house.
customer_reviews.author: gracie9797

customer_reviews.title: Quality much Lower than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Tramontina kitchen shears/scissors for 15 years and thought I needed an upgrade. The Kitchen scissors from Kinchen Aid are far inferior to the Brazilian made shears. I just use the cheap KA as regular scissors as the quality is so poor they are useless in the kitchen, I would advise looking at better quality brands before buying these. Made in China just didn't have the quality of s/s steel blades. Wasn't worth returning. Wurstof is very good also.
customer_reviews.author: shallowminded

customer_reviews.title: Shears That Don't Cut.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these. First pair, the nut holding them together would loosen up no matter how many times I tightened them. Kitchen aide product so I ordered 2nd pair. They literally won't cut anything. Waste of money and trying to cut something with these shears is so frustrating. I dislike these shears so much, I felt obligated to warn people.
customer_reviews.author: Philipg929

customer_reviews.title: Already rusting
customer_reviews.text: If anything touches raw meat I always wash it and put it in the dishwasher, if it’s said to be dishwasher safe. Apparently these were not, even though they said they were because they already started to rust and I’ve had them for about a week
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Nice kitchen scissor
customer_reviews.text: I am a little hesitate to buy it when I first read the review. Anyway I still purchased it because I really need a kitchen scissor. I found that actually this kitchen scissor is not bad. It is sharp, easy to use and clean. It is way better than the scissor I got from dollar tree lol.
customer_reviews.author: H C

customer_reviews.title: The Best Kitchen Shears
customer_reviews.text: These are the best Kitchen Shears I've ever had. I just ordered two more for myself since my pair is now in the camping equipment for keeps. I also bought a pair for my bf, who's kitchen shears suck and won't cut paper, let alone chicken bones or plastic packaging. They cut through anything, seriously, and last a good long time. I've had a pair for 4 years, use them at least a couple of times per week, and they still look and cut like brand new. They also go in the dishwasher, I put them in the silverware rack on the bottom shelf. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sharp, durable
customer_reviews.text: My husband has bent so many kitchen tools, which is why I had to buy new scissors. He’s banned from these because they’re so nice, but I doubt he could do much damage. They’re very sturdy, comfortable to hold, and seem ambidextrous (hubs is a lefty). Definitely my favorite kitchen shears that I’ve owned
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kerst

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Don't put them in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Love these scissors. I use them every day. I cut meats, veggies, cardboard, everything. These are my second pair. My kids put the first pair in the dishwasher repeatedly and the handle started getting tacky and weird, but the scissors did not wear out. I will always have a pair in my kitchen and will probably keep these in mind as a housewarming gift. Kitchen scissors are a household item that you don't realize you need until you have a good pair.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hood

customer_reviews.title: ... my house looking for things to cut LOL I love them! They are sharp and easy to use ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought these scissors for me and I have had them about 2 weeks and literally walk through my house looking for things to cut LOL I love them! They are sharp and easy to use with my arthritic hands. I absolutely love the teal/turquoise color handle. They also come with a nice plastic hard sleeve to store in when not in use. I attached a photo next to a few of my kitchen items to help show the color (if that matters to someone trying to match colors ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last (3 months old)
customer_reviews.text: It was great when it was new, 3 months ago. Now it won't cut the plastic bag off from around a magazine; the soft plastic folds up around the blades. It's as if the blades are now too far apart. We used our old one for many years, until the plastic on the handle finally gave out. This one looks similar but evidently isn't well made. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: jdh

customer_reviews.title: Great shears!
customer_reviews.text: These shears are great! Very nice quality & super sharp. Planning to buy 3 more for the cooks in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought two pair - instantly useful, as I used the first pair to open the second pair - and I'm quite pleased with them. I bought them to replace a pair of utility shears that were largely plastic, with metal blades attached to the plastic, that gave way after a few years of basic service. I wanted something I could resharpen, and something that wouldn't break quite so readily under actual strain. My only complaint, and it's not much of one, hence the rating, is that I can't take them apart to wash them. It's not a requirement for my purposes, and given the price, it's a triviality. Looking forward to years of service from these...
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Have owed numerous kitchen shears over the past 20+ years but these by far are my favorite. Sharp clean cut. Only disadvantage is they are hand wash instead of dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen shears at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I'll admit... I've got mix n' match knife blocks. Although they're usually full (several in the dishwasher at the moment), I probably only have 20% of the originals. Not a big deal to me. In this crazy household, I just need many steak knives (3 boys) and a few good kitchen shears that I use daily. Over the years my kids have done who knows what with my utensils, never to be seen again. Enter Amazon! Great shears at a great price, super sharp, fit great in both of my blocks. They come with a sheath but I don't use it. Easy clean by hand or dishwasher. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Internet $hopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Do not come apart for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: While these are called "kitchen scissors" they do not come apart for easy cleaning the way typical kitchen scissors do. These are large, soft handled, fairly sharp scissors, with reasonably good leverage. However, if you use them to e.g. cut apart a chicken, they are a pain to clean since the blades do not come apart (gunk gets caught down where the blades attach to each other). Therefore, they are not ideal kitchen scissors. FYI, putting sharp blades (knives, scissors) in the dishwasher will dull them considerably. Therefore, while these are technically dishwasher safe, cleaning these (or any sharp blades) in the dishwasher is not a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Anne V

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best Kitchen Shears By Any Means
customer_reviews.text: These shears have lost their edge after only a few week's use. I keep them clean and store them in the provided sheath, but the quality is disappointing. I have not used them on anything that would dull the blades -- basically they are used to open plastic packaged food bags and such. They have never been used for any heavy duty tasks like trimming poultry, etc. so I really don't understand why they have lost the edge so quickly. I don't recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: WG Thomas

customer_reviews.title: lightweight kitchen scissors
customer_reviews.text: My first use was gutting a fish. Very sharp at first but gets dull very easily. Not made for people with smaller hands. I'm sure it would be great for cutting veggies and such.
customer_reviews.author: Tuan Ton

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite kitchen shears
customer_reviews.text: These are great kitchen shears! They have a large, comfortable handle. (I have small hands and still prefer these over our other shears). They cut well and come to a nice, sharp point. They are quite a bit better than the more expensive kitchen shears we've purchased from Amazon, and we've tried quite a few.
customer_reviews.author: jd11

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value for the money
customer_reviews.text: There's a reason these KitchenAid scissors are voted a Best Buy by many reviewers. They have plenty of room for your Thumb and 3 Fingers in the holes and they are priced at half the price of many other comparable scissors. They fit nicely in the scissors slot of the Knife Holder Block. Easy opening and closing of blades when cutting and will cut thru a chicken back with relative ease. This is my second set. The first set somehow lost a portion of the rubber that cover the handling area (maybe from being put in dishwasher) after about 8 years. I still keep them as a back up pair.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon D. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SCISSORS
customer_reviews.text: After using this pair of scissors, I ordered another pair with different handle color. I am so glad I bought these scissors as I cut quite often and I have cut many items within the first week of having them. If I needed a third pair, I would certainly buy another but I need only 2 pairs, one for the kitchen and one for work. I would highly recommend ordering a pair as you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: happyday

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, quality isn't what it used to be.
customer_reviews.text: We had a pair of these (same brand, looks like same model) for about 8 years and they were fantastic. The only reason we don't have our original set anymore is that we lost them (don't ask me how you lose kitchen scissors, I have no idea). These new ones still work well, but the plastic handle is definitely lighter and cheaper. I hope they hold up to everyday use! I guess they're not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: phillygirl

customer_reviews.title: I’m not allowed to use.
customer_reviews.text: Nice scissors. Replaced our kitchen ones after I cut open a super glue bottle to put some glue in my cracked heals. It all went down hill after that. I glued myself to my wife favorite Sherpa blanket. When I went to cut myself free the scissors broke because I got glue on them. Don’t worry I got free with a knife. I would’ve gotten away with it too, but my wife noticed the scissors were gone almost immediately. Shame on amazon for not getting them here faster.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Finally a kitchen shears for man hands
customer_reviews.text: So I have owned several kinds of kitchen shears of the years and these actually fit my hands. Sure they are simple and don't have all the bells and whistles, but they work great around the kitchen. These shears/scissors are sharp and have a tight fitting hinge. Just to reiterate if you have large hands these the the ones you want!
customer_reviews.author: IMA_Redneck

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use for small hands
customer_reviews.text: These are much bigger and bulkier than I can use. I've used Joyce Chen for years, but am unable to find locally. These had good reviews so I thought I'd try them. They work much better for my husband (who rarely cooks)
customer_reviews.author: Golden Mom

customer_reviews.title: they don't make them like they used to
customer_reviews.text: i bought a favorite pair of kitchen aid brand shears a decade ago, and hoped these would be of the same quality. they're definitely not, and they were approximately the same cost. i am using these, but if i had it to do over again, i'd splurge on a more expensive pair. maybe a different brand. these are on a par with the cheap shears from dollar tree. biggest difference is these are slightly larger than the dollar tree ones, that's it.
customer_reviews.author: leigh

customer_reviews.title: Rust very easily
customer_reviews.text: These scissors work exactly as expected but I cannot give it more than 2 stars they rust in several spots after every wash. I make sure to dry them open. I find that kind of ridiculous for kitchen scissors. Due to the rusting, I have not use these more than a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Hello Moopi

customer_reviews.title: I Bought These for the Brand Name. Not Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Great Value. Work beautifully in my kitchen for all my varied cutting needs. They are pretty too. I bought the turquoise ones, which actually match all my Pioneer Woman stuff. Not an important prerequisite, but a fun one! They clean up easily, are comfortable to use, and can take on any job I can give them. This is a good buy and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Knox

customer_reviews.title: Holy smokes these are great kitchen shears
customer_reviews.text: I used to struggle using my Farberware kitchen shears to spatchcock a chicken, but these changed the game. They are super sturdy, so my ability to put more grip strength on them without fear of them breaking in my hand means I can cut through most things with remarkable ease. The blades are sharp and strong, so they require only a single squeeze to break through small poultry bones. These cost more than most other kitchen shears, but there's a reason. They are great, I'd buy them again, but probably won't have to because they appear to be built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Schweiss

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all purpose shears
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace a pair of shears whose plastic handle cracked off, so took the opportunity to get one in a fun color that the wife appreciates. Good size, comfortable in hand, effective at odd light duty cutting tasks around the house. Haven't needed to try it on cutting through carcasses, but I also have kitchen knives for that. It did have a few rust spots on it in the first few days after drying on a rack, but they came off easily with some Flitz polish, and we haven't seen any since. With some normal care this should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: ffej101

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, heavy duty, sharp scissors for the kitchen and general utility!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Who needs a bottle opener on their kitchen scissors? Most of the other ones - which looked identical from a number of other brands - had bottle openers on the backs of one their blades... and were more expensive. No thanks! These are perfect! Nice, heavy duty, sharp, clean cutting and reasonably priced. Who could ask for more? I highly recommend these over the others I've seen here on Amazon. A winner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and sharp
customer_reviews.text: I have bought too many dollar store scissors for my kitchen that break pretty quickly. I decided that since I use them quite a bit in my kitchen that I would spend a little more money for 2 good pairs (one for meat products and the other for veggies, etc). I'm impressed with the quality of these for a very reasonable price. I have put them in the dishwasher and they seem to come out very well. I also like the little plastic sheaths that come with them.
customer_reviews.author: Blue DragonflyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen necessity
customer_reviews.text: I wish I hadn't waited so long to upgrade my kitchen scissors. These scissors are soooo handy to have in the kitchen. I bought 2 pairs and I'm so glad I did. I use them to cut some veggies and fruit, meat. I use them every meal to cut my babies food up. They are so handy and work so well and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: MianJaze

customer_reviews.title: WOW!! ✂
customer_reviews.text: Such a wonderful product! I mainly wanted to get the scissors because they are dishwasher safe, we have other scissors that are from Kroger and Dollar Tree that are not dishwasher safe that I know of and get the job done but definitely don't compare to these!! These scissors cut very well and do very well in the dishwasher, definitely recommend these scissors! ✂

customer_reviews.title: rusted junk
customer_reviews.text: I'm so angry that the return window had closed because these ended up starting to rust the first week after getting them. Now the tips are rusted and it's disgusting. I have other cheaper scissors that aren't name brand but we use them for all other purposes (not food) they have gotten wet numerous times and never rusted. These Kitchenaid scissors are a name only because it's so disgusting how quickly these rusted .
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: should be easier to clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shears about 8 months ago. I bought them to cut up 3 liter water bottles to make more room in our recycle bin. We go through about 10 per week. These shears are still working great. As for using them on food, there is a huge problem with salmonella in this country. It seems to be coming from everywhere. Contamination is my issue. There should be a a way to take apart the shears without having to use a wrench. If they could figure out a way, it make these scissors perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Handgunner

customer_reviews.title: Thank you KitchenAid!
customer_reviews.text: KitchenAid speaks for itself. I have many KitchenAid products and haven’t been let down yet, these scissors are not exception. Comfortable, sharp and the perfect kitchen companion. I’ve only had them a few days and have already used them to prepare herbs and cut up chicken. I suppose in a pinch they would be sharp enough to cut open plastic packaging or even metal. I just refuse to allow anyone to use them for that.
customer_reviews.author: CeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Rusted already.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shears in April 2020 and noticed tonight that they're already rusting. Supposed to be stainless steel blades. I always hand wash them and either air dry or dry them myself. Never been put in the dishwasher. I've used them quite a few times. They're sharp and nice to hold but the rust factor is a bit of a surprise. I've had other kitchen shears for years that haven't rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Good value for nice to use kitchen shears
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of these scissors in about 5-6 years. I use them almost daily and put them in the dishwasher, then replace when the squishy part of the handles starts to get gummy from too many washes. I don't baby them and at this price I'm fine with buying a new pair every couple years, since they feel and work great. Got the Ocean Blue this time, which is more of a sky verging on periwinkle blue... not the deeper mid blue I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a 15 year old pair of fancy German scissors that my father in law broke doing god knows what with them. The old brand is now made in china and poorly reviewed so I thought I'd try something different. I really didn't have high expectations but these are really good quality, they'll cut through a chicken's breastbone with little effort and no flex. I'm quite happy I tried something new.
customer_reviews.author: John Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Great size and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Used these several months before purchasing a second pair. They fit my hand well and are sharp. The finger openings are a generous size so the shears never get stuck on my hand. There was no rusting until I left them sitting in water overnight accidentally about a month ago! There was a small amount but it has not gotten any worse. I wash them in the top rack of the dishwasher several times a week.
customer_reviews.author: SB3

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen scissors!
customer_reviews.text: Great so far! I like the material of the handles, super easy to hold! They work well for me and my little hands, but they also work for my husbands big hands! We use them on anything food- chicken, veggie, fruit etc. They have been washed a ton in the dish washer with no problems at all! Great price, great product and fast shipping! I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Mippsibean

customer_reviews.title: Just OK - started to rust quickly
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special about them. I am disappointed that they started to rust after leaving them in the sink overnight with only a little residual water on them. I am happier with the 3 pack of all purpose scissors that I bought for less cost.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Every Pair is Different
customer_reviews.text: I own at least 5 pairs of these shears and use them to cut the twine of off hay bales, in the shop, in the kitchen...everywhere! For the price they are great and the blade cover is a nice feature to have. The only issue I have is that while they all technically work, some of the pairs are adjusted differently and don't cut as well. The blades are not connected by an adjustable screw, so you get what you get. Still worth the $8 bucks or so.
customer_reviews.author: farmer cindy

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid Junkie
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these scissors! I received a pair when I purchased my knife set and I loved them so much that I had to have another pair (you know, for the 370 times you'll lose the first pair). They are VERY sharp and hold their sharpness. I have not come across any rust and they are very comfortable to use. Great price, GREAT color, amazing construction and arrived exactly as described. Thanks! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Quality scissors in a pretty color
customer_reviews.text: I leave my kitchen scissors out all the time, so when changing the decor in my kitchen this week I ordered the scissors in a color that will go well with other items: blue. They're well-balanced and cut very well. Only complaint I have is that the packaging was difficult to open.
customer_reviews.author: Somebody

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME scissors!
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are AWESOME! I bought the red pair awhile back and decided to get a second pair. They're sharp and fit hands of all sizes. They come in a variety of colors to match your kitchen perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: outdoorsy4816

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a pair of these that I loved and that I ruined during a home improvement project. (I was cutting something that turned out to be too thick to cut with scissors. Oops!) I liked them so much, I bought them again. They are really, really sharp and cut smoothly. The plastic carrying case/sheath is a nice little addition too. These are a must have for any home toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: MARMich

customer_reviews.title: Very good scissors
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with these scissors. They are light weight but sturdy and they cut extremely well. They cut so easily through the nylon netted bag that my Mandarin oranges come in. Every pair of scissors that I have struggles to cut through that. I've use them to cut chicken breast in half and they are my BEST scissors. I'll have no problem cleaning them. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Jo Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great for crafting!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike others that use these shears in the kitchen, I use them for arts and crafts! The shears can easily cut through art projects of 3mil laminating pouches and 65lbs cardstock. -- I also really like that it has a plastic protective guard that snaps in place. It helps prevent accidentally cutting your hands and fingers when grabbing them quickly out of a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: KLV

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for cutting meat!
customer_reviews.text: Slices through chicken and steak with ease, both raw and cooked. So much easier than using a knife - I eat a ton of meat, so I find these to be very convenient. Make sure you thoroughly dry them after cleaning, because they will rust. Otherwise, seem to be really well made.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor F.

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for an All-Purpose Scissor
customer_reviews.text: These are great kitchen scissors. We have 2 of these in our kitchen. We used them for vegetables, chicken, bread, herbs, and just about anything you need to cut in pieces. They are easy to hold and cut very well. I even use them outside the kitchen - like for cardboard, rope, thin plastic, etc. An excellent value and a well-made product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Z

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of kitchen aid scissors. The first ones mysteriously disappeared. I had them over five years and they cut everything from paper to cardboard to chicken bones and stayed sharp. I tried the kind that come apart for cleaning and that was nice but they tended to come apart when I didn’t want them to. I still feel that I can properly disinfect these.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi 42

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen shears!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these kitchen shears because I am always losing my kitchen shears. These work really well and are very sturdy. I really like the red color. I highly recommend these if you want some high quality kitchen shears! I’m sure these will stand the test of time, more than the other ones I had that parts snapped off. Definitely pick these up!
customer_reviews.author: Krystyna

customer_reviews.title: Better than most but...
customer_reviews.text: still not as good as I'd like. I have bought these before meaning this is a replacement for a worn out product. Everything else I've seen out there, that I would rate as a better product, is exponentially more expensive. On a cost vs benefit analysis these are the best buy, even considering they have to be replaced every year or so.
customer_reviews.author: Number One

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these fit in my hand, that they open/close smoothly, and they are dishwasher safe. They are really quite lovely. I use them in the kitchen for snipping/cutting. Nice size, not too big, not too small.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cupas

customer_reviews.title: Already rusting
customer_reviews.text: This seem like good quality but they started to rust within a few days. I have never put them in the dishwasher and I always hand dry before putting them away. They are plenty sharp but I’m disappointed about the rust spots.
customer_reviews.author: Paula J Berry

customer_reviews.title: Multi-Purpose Scissors - Initial Quality Seems Fine
customer_reviews.text: These KitchenAid Multi-Purpose Scissors were purchased to replace some broken kitchen shears. The initial quality seems fine considering the low price. These are not fancy kitchen shears, but I expect they'll work well for routine kitchen functions.
customer_reviews.author: fp shew

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Scissors
customer_reviews.text: I really like these scissors. They're sturdy and I'm delighted with the little shield for the ends. I use them all of the time. They seem to cut through everything I want to use them on. Beat the heck out of all the ones I've had before.
customer_reviews.author: Sam C

customer_reviews.title: The Cutting Edge
customer_reviews.text: In the kitchen we was using some old left-handed round-ended scissors I swiped when I was in kindy garden so these are a lot better. And they are large and sharp so if I ever need to kill an intruder in the kitchen these are my go-to weapon.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence G Burton

customer_reviews.title: Slice Through Your Food
customer_reviews.text: Kitchen Shears are a great all purpose tool for cooking. These Kitchenaid Shears are fantastic. They are well designed and easy to hold. The blades are very sharp. They can be used for everything for opening packaging or for cutting through food. Sometimes it is easier to use shears than a knife, like if you need to cut through cooked noodles or vegetable greens.
customer_reviews.author: A. Silverstone

customer_reviews.title: Sharpest kitchen scissors!
customer_reviews.text: I use kitchen scissors daily to cut meat and many other food items so I was looking for a pair of scissors that is sharp and durable. This pair of kitchen aid scissors is very sharp and has lasted over a year and is still as sharp as the day I bought it. I am purchasing 2 more pairs because it took me so long to find a good pair that I love!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Better Than The Dollar Store Brand
customer_reviews.text: I’d bought a couple pair from the Dollar Store and low (price) and behold, I got what I paid for. Then I went to Amazon and decided on these Kitchen Aid beauty’s and this is a case where you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Cuts well - Comfortable Handles
customer_reviews.text: These are quite usable kitchen shears. They are made of thick stainless steel and have very nicely ground blades, one of which is micro serrated. They cut everything well and don't slip because of the micro serrations. They do not disassemble, but are still relatively easy to clean as long as you clean them immediately after use and rinse the pivot area well.
customer_reviews.author: Lotus-SevenTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: "Best kitchen shears ever!"
customer_reviews.text: Best kitchen shears ever. That's my wife's quote after using these for the first time. My wife cooks quite a bit; has won some culinary contests; and is a bit picky when it comes to her kitchen appliances and equipment. She wanted kitchen shears, not something that would crack open nuts, help her open a jar, ... or all the other gadget things the other shears will also do. I bought these because 1) the price was right, 2) we have KitchenAid small appliances, and 3) my wife wanted something with some color to it (the black scissors "hide" from her). All in all, this was an awesome purchase for us; she's happy and that makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: MVL

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy, well made material. Collects gunk where the blades and the blue plastic parts meet. Not so easy to clean the crevices where gunk gathers. Also the middle of the handles are blades too. Im sure it has a use for it but not so sure. But still pretty good for every day use given this price point.
customer_reviews.author: J from k

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Kitchen Shears
customer_reviews.text: After owning many different kitchen shears, I have concluded these are my favorite for a few reasons: they are long and nimble for mulching salads, and have not fallen apart after a year+ of use. I hand wash though. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Used these to quickly cut the fat off of chicken. They work great. Easy to use and clean (i only have hand washed and dried and there has been no corrosion yet). I like the cushioned rubber handles that makes these comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Quality delivered again!
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of people borrowing my scissors. Bought a set that is easily distinguishable as mine. A little bonus is that the scissors come with a plastic sleeve that to this point has kept the kids at bay. Sharper than most so makes life easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mopar Madness

customer_reviews.title: Nice but flawed
customer_reviews.text: These are very sharp and clean easy. Reason for 1 star is that after i cleaned them I was pretty sure I dried them all the way. Well I must have been wrong because they are rusting by the screw and just a random spot on the blade. Whats that all about? If they didn't rust I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ThatMutha

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Not only were these kitchen scissors delivered super-fast, but they also work like a dream! The kitchen scissors in my household are always put to the test with various tasks from cooking to craft time. These scissors cut amazingly well, are super precise, and cut cleanly. As you can see, I tested them out on a milk carton just to be sure. They also come with a safety cap which is a really nice bonus. I am super happy with my purchase and they could not have come at a better time as I needed some new kitchen scissors because my old ones were falling apart lol
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Don't run with scissors
customer_reviews.text: These are sharp and feel like they'll cut through anything. I have a pair in tube utility drawer. I've cut through heavy packaging with ease. I like the options of different colors. That helps me identify what scissors with different functions. They're definitely easy to hold and ergonomic.
customer_reviews.author: M Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy workhorse kitchen shears.
customer_reviews.text: These kitchen scissors used to be everywhere. But after our old pale pink shears stopped cutting after a decade, replacements by KitchenAid were not to be found. Luckily we found this pair. They are exactly what we needed. Well designed, sharp, and easy to store was what we needed, and definitely what we got!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I spent $1 on my previous kitchen scissors. They lasted a few years but now I’m loving these scissors and never realized truly what a difference spending a bit more would make.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Hammen

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Shears
customer_reviews.text: These were great for my daughters kitchen apartment! Things that you don't realize you need in your kitchen until you move out. Good price, size, quality & arrived quickly. Stocking stuffer for my college grad.
customer_reviews.author: barbclay

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sharp, no issues with dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to replace a generic plastic shear that came with a knife set. We toss ours in the dishwasher pretty regularly and it's still free of rust spots. The Aqua Sky color looks great, and the price was cheaper than anywhere locally.
customer_reviews.author: UFeng

customer_reviews.title: Nice scissors
customer_reviews.text: I bought my old pair through amazon too (a black and white handle one) and this one works way better, it feels more expensive and it cuts very well, the old pair is not bad since it is not damaged for over a year use, I'm only getting this one because we lost one of the scissors somehow (it disappeared...) And I would get this one again if lose another pair again.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sharp and sturdy. I think these are the first scissors I ever bought in my life. I don't know why I was being so cheap. I have used hand me downs for 50 years. Work provided scissors there so I never needed a good pair. These are better or as good as the best I have ever had at work
customer_reviews.author: HerMan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Handle Size And Grip
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and function. I’ve had the kitchen scissors that come apart to clean but I think I like these better because I would find the ones that separate would do it unintentionally. These do not come apart. Which I think is a good thing. Love the color blue. Nice handle size and grip.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, sharp, multi-use scissors
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily to cut fruit, pizza, paper, etc. They have not dulled & wash easily in the dishwasher. For safety, when the scissors are in the drawer, I keep the plastic snap-on protector over the blades. I purchased a 2nd pair after seeing how sturdy my 1st pair was.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: KitchenAid is the best. Love these scissors- use them for EVERYTHING! I’ve even cut chicken breast up with them. They work perfectly and are easy to clean. Must have if you like to cook Plus the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Durability is an A+
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I like the first pair that I ordered another one. I can cut most anything with ease. The handles are large enough to have a good control while cutting. The blades sharp and appears to stay sharp. The blade cover is a very good extra. It snaps into place for safety. And the cover is a hard plastic You will be satisfied with these scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Pattyann

customer_reviews.title: Great Scissors!
customer_reviews.text: I have been needing some new kitchen scissors and these are incredible. The cover keeps the steel from rusting, dishwasher safe and the handle makes cutting through difficult meats actually not hurt your hands. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Bosse

customer_reviews.title: Buy these scissors, feel unsurpassed power and potential
customer_reviews.text: Do you need to feel more in control of your life? More powerful? Stronger? Adaptable? Do you have enemies in need of defeat? Sticky plastic wrap? Parchment paper? The bones of your rivals? Do you want to be able to cut everything from a tiny wisp of cloth to actual tin cans? BUY THESE SCISSORS AND KNOW A LIMITLESS POWER
customer_reviews.author: Emily Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Great shears for use in the kitchen. I love the quality of the blades and handle. I have tried many other styles and brands. These seem to be consistently high quality. I have had them for a couple of months now, and so far, no problems - and I use them a lot! I like the soft grip - easy for arthritic joints - and the stainless steel blades that can be used for chicken, safely washed, and used on herbs for salads. I have not found anything yet that they cannot cut.
customer_reviews.author: B. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: The handle has a bump that hits my thumb in the wrong place. These are uncomfortable to use for several minutes. The blades are nice and sharp. The packaging was NOT consumer friendly - needed scissors to open the scissors package - oh, and be careful not to cut your hand on the sharp hard plastic packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: I kinda love these!
customer_reviews.text: The scissors that came with my knife block set broke so I had been limping by with conventional cheapie scissors as a replacement. Which is fine for opening plastic bags but is terrible for any sort of heavier duty like cutting through bacon or chicken. I finally broke down and purchased these and I absolutely love them! They are sturdy, sharp and strong! I don't know what took me so long to replace them. Now my biggest problem is training my teenager not to reach for these whenever he's working on his craft projects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kinda big and very pointy
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with these a little the tips are sharp and I have issues with it when I’m cutting things in the kitchen. I just feel constantly like I’m gonna hurt myself. I just with them tips where more blunt. The scissors are also a little on the large side.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Used These Continuously for 4 years snd....
customer_reviews.text: I’m amazed by how sturdy they are (I’ve dropped them several times and was sure that they were going to crack), how they’ve managed to stay sharp and how they’ve never rusted despite the fact that I’ve used them continuously for the last five years and almost always wash them in the dishwasher! You’ll definitely get your money’s worth if you add these to your cooking arsenal!
customer_reviews.author: Cay James

customer_reviews.title: They rust very easily but they do the job
customer_reviews.text: They rust very easily. I read this is a different review and hoped my shears would be different. They aren’t, I’m wondering if these are defective shears being sold at a fraction of the price. They do the job you just have to be sure to dry them completely so they don’t rust.
customer_reviews.author: dw

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and quick perfect to snap a chicked or open Amazon shipments
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I discovered the item was better than reviewed and left out key benefits that I have found to be better than expected. Price is not the only item and yes this was a fantastic deal that you can’t find elsewhere. And yes I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nope...... try another kind
customer_reviews.text: Re-review. They seemed like great scissors. But after about 1 month. They were not cutting anything anymore. I bought a scissor Sharpener. It didn’t help. My brother-in-law sharpened it with a professional stone. It helped a little bit I would NOT recommend the scissors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price. Don’t be fooled by the brand name!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these kitchen scissors about 6 months ago as a replacement for a previous pair of kitchen scissors that stopped cutting. I thought “oh, kitchenaid is a great brand so they won’t be crappy like the rest of them.” I was wrong. I don’t know what’s so darn difficult about making a decent pair of kitchen scissors but apparently it’s impossible for even a huge company like kitchenaid.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I reakky like all the KitchenAid products and have quite a few, and this one doesn't disappoint. These scissors are well made, very sharp, easy to ckean and hold, and the cover is a nice added feature. I can add the color is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: DENISE GONZALEZ

product_meta.title: KitchenAid Classic Kitchen Shears with Soft Grip Handles, Red, 8.85-Inch - KC351OHERA
product_meta.description: Color:RedThese KitchenAid Shears with Soft Grip Handles will be one of the most valuable tools in your kitchen. You will find yourself using them for many short cuts and everyday tasks. Heavy duty shears feature a sharp stainless steel blade and soft comfort grip handle. Dishwasher safe. 8-3/4 inch long.
feature_bullets: PLASTIC GUARD INCLUDED: These KitchenAid Soft Grip Handle Shears comes with a protective, plastic blade guard
STAINLESS STEEL BLADES: The blades are crafted from stainless steel that resists rusting
CLEAN CUT EVERY TIME: Each blade features micro-serrations for enhanced cutting performance and are extra thick for added strength and durability
COMFORT GRIP HANDLE: The handle is shaped for comfort and features a soft-grip coating for stability
DISHWASHER SAFE: Hand wash is recommended but these shears are dishwasher safe

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars12,820 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
